sysevent_email_template.message_html: Thank you for contacting the ER Service Desk at ER.Servicedesk@gov.sk.ca. Please do not reply to this automated email, as this email is confirmation that we have received your request and case ${number} has been created on ${sys_created_on} for ${consumer}. A Business Support Technician will be working to get back to you with an answer as soon as possible. As the majority of requests require research to resolve, it can sometimes take up to 2 business days to respond, though every effort is made to respond back within 1 business day.
sysevent_email_template.name: er.case.opened.for.consumer
sysevent_email_template.subject: Case ${number} opened - ${short_description}

sys_package.display_value: Energy and Resources Customer Service Management

sys_scope.display_value: Energy and Resources Customer Service Management
